website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few flaws, this is an acceptable carrier for air cargo shipping, and an extremely sturdy option for transporting cats up to 15 pounds safely to the vet. It’s a good example of why it’s sometimes a good idea to go ahead and pay a lot more for reliability.
pros: Metal side vents and metal door secure this sturdy, traditional carrier which meets USDA and International Air Transport Association transport requirements, allowing it to be used as a pet cargo carrier on airlines
With threaded bolts holding it together, the carrier is easy to assemble and sturdy enough to withstand accidental drops when carrying
Extra bolts are included to use either as replacement or reinforcement
Good return policy and fast replacement reported
cons: No rear vent, which at least one user resolved by drilling their own vent holes post-purchase
Predrilled tie-down strap holes are not part of the smaller 15-pound carrier
A few users felt the carrier was small and flimsy, and cats over 15 pounds might be pushing their luck in it
Some reports of product arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Not as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these before from a pet store and it looks just like the picture. This one is a darker brown color, has painted door and window bars, instead of chrome like pictured, and looks like cheaper plastic. The reason we ordered this particular model is that all the Kennels in the pet stores looked very cheaply made, so we checked Amazon and theirs looked just like the one we had. We paid less for the one we had also.
customer_reviews.author: G. Magin

customer_reviews.title: TRASHHHHH
customer_reviews.text: Item is Trash! Flimsy, not the color Stated! The color is a darker NOT Linen and comes with black metal grids! NOT silver! This wouldn’t normally be an issue despite it is nothing like the one advertised! If we are also being petty! The kennel is not flat bottom and it also came without a Petmate Sticker. I have seen multiple reviews with other issues on this product. I expect a full refund for such shoddy and utter trash product! WHERE IS THE QUALITY CONTROL FOR THE MONEY WE SPEND ON OUR PETS!. The manufacture needs to update its descriptions and product shots of this item!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Airy & Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable solid hard plastic home or travel crate. Has metal grid ventilation opening (not punched out plastic) on top across sides & good solid metal door. Nice & airy. My dog loves it even to just to go take a nap in. It maybe a few dollars more but its worth it. I would definately buy again & I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The main purpose for purchasing this kennel was the size and the price. Noted there are some comments about the material used for this carrier being a hard plastic and easier to break, which is true. However for the price and the use it’s worth the money. Just don’t go throwing it around everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bang

customer_reviews.title: Wrong parts included, instructions do not match product
customer_reviews.text: The kennel itself is good quality but the wing nuts/bolts do not fit (wing nuts too small for included bolts) and the instructions depict another product (mentions holes which do not exist and photos do not match). I'm too lazy to return so made it work using zip ties rather than the bolts. Think for nearly $50 for the small size would include the correct parts and instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bastin

customer_reviews.title: Safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go to kennel for the last 20 years. What makes it different than most is that it has more head room and less length. It is 15" high, 21" long 16" wide. I think dogs are more comfortable with head room when they want to sit up and don't bonk their heads on the top. It's also sturdy, well made and they seem to last forever. It also seat belts securely into the car's rear seat to keep dogs secure in the car. I show my dogs so got a Sprinter van and had cabinets built in specifically to hold these kennels and can now carry up to 10 dogs and know they are safe.
customer_reviews.author: DocDVM

customer_reviews.title: Petmate Vari Kennel Pet Carrier
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Malshi Puppy and it is high enough, wide enough and long enough to give her plenty of space without having to duck head or squeeze through doorway and can lay down with room to spare. Quality is in this item as it's stronger than what I've seen selling at WalMart for a few dollars less. I'd rather pay those few dollars more and know it won't need replacing. The metal door is also strong as is the spring closure. Plenty of extra bolts/tops are included. Your pup will be safe in this as it really is very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Cat Insurance
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to easily carry and transport. Well made. I keep two fully assembled for my two kitties for trips to the vet and also in case of fire and my apartment building is evacuated. Ever try and round up 2 hysterical cats at 1:00 a.m. in the morning? Alarms, smoke, flashing lights, sirens, yelling, excitement, my heart was pounding, seconds ticking... Stuff n' Go and my two darlings were in their cages and safe with me outside where I stashed them out-of-the-way safe inside my parked car. Then I started to think about other valuables, but the most important were safe n' sound. Think about it. Cheap insurance. It happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: GetReal2010

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market for Cats
customer_reviews.text: We are cat people and have transported our cats using this carrier between the United States, Europe and Asia several times over the years. They are sturdy and accepted by all airlines. Recommend replacing the plastic wing nuts with metal screws and washers, as some airlines are now getting picky about the fasteners. One of our six carriers is seven years old andstill in excellent condition. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: good crate
customer_reviews.text: This crate is what I expected. Have a similar one already; well, ok; I have two... Use it at home for naps and overnight. Certainly not substantial enough to ship a pet, but fine for travel in your car (or your personal airplane - ha ha!). Lightweight. Easy to put together - in theory, at least. You need some hand strength to turn the wing nuts; if you have arthritis you might need to arrange for some young muscle for this part. Dismantles easily, too. mb
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Color darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is a much darker color than the picture. There was also some grease on the side. But it appears very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this kennel
customer_reviews.text: We have a petite cat who needed a flight to come to her new home. I was able to have this sent to my friend and she was able to ship our kitty to us via air line cargo. Our kitty stands (from bottom of her feet to the tips of her ears) about 13 inches tall, so this carrier was perfect for her. We bought the kennel pet dishes to go along with this. Cage was sturdy and met Delta's strict safety requirements with the kennel - we couldn't be happier to have this for our kitty.
customer_reviews.author: T.C. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great for small birds!
customer_reviews.text: I modified this crate for international air travel for my birds (a cockatiel and a brown-headed parrot). It's sturdy and durable, but lightweight and open enough where the birds could see everything and didn't seem as anxious as they had in other, more closed-in crates in the past. I wasn't worried about it breaking or falling apart, and the airline people said they like these kind because they tie down easily and securely. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Might fit 15lb cat at most a 10lb dog
customer_reviews.text: This crate inside where your pet will be, is actually only 15” length x 11” width. The lip around this is extremely wide and edges taper slightly. When choosing a crate 6” in length is very important information to have.
customer_reviews.author: Cali-kaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my dachshund. I like the way the top and bottom attach with screws.
customer_reviews.author: In Arizona

customer_reviews.title: I love the Petmate kennels
customer_reviews.text: LuLu loves having room to tune around in it. She can also sit up without having to duck her head. I love the Petmate kennels, the only product I do lot like is the one with a plastic an door is very difficult to open it. I have learned to only get the ones that have metal doors. I love the one I purchased. It is very sturdy I know I will be able to use this kennel fore as long as I have LuLu.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had bought two carriers with the clips. Needles to say I had to return them as when I was traveling with my cats the bottom fell and one of my cats got hurt due to the clips not staying clipped. It is not worth to buy the cheap clip to close carriers. Now with this carrier I can transport my cats and they are safe, as this carrier does not come apart unles it is manually unscrewed.
customer_reviews.author: Brazil123

customer_reviews.title: Although the size is as described, when I finally ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the size is as described, when I finally went to pick up the crate by the handle on top, only half of the handle was attached! I wasn't able to return it because it was just outside of the return window. Additionally, there is no vent in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica F.

customer_reviews.title: Vari Kennels are the best
customer_reviews.text: We got this for traveling for our cat to give her more room to sit up and turn around. The bottom is smooth, unlike some of the older Vari Kennels that had the bottom with the same "dimple" design as the top as pictured here. Works much better and provides a smoother surface for your pet to sit on. Still has the "trough" around the edge in case of accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Elfin Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Color is not as shown but works well
customer_reviews.text: The color is very different than shown. It is less cream/off white and more dark tan/brown.
customer_reviews.author: vtownart

customer_reviews.title: For our new puppy
customer_reviews.text: We have a larger version for our male, and he is quite content. The female puppy has to settle down to appreciate it ,she is on the move. It's good for training , we call it the "basket". As in "go to your basket" it works. The quality is very good and will last longer than the dog, a sad thought.
customer_reviews.author: James Norstad

customer_reviews.title: Crate
customer_reviews.text: Nice crate for the money. Not sure I would actually use it for airline travel. It seems a bit flimsy. Works great for what we use it for.
customer_reviews.author: P. RobbinsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used this once to take my cat to the vet. I put it on my shelf in the garage. It fell 4’ and the entire top cracked to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Foerster

customer_reviews.title: Best carrier for cats or small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Best carrier for cats or small dogs. Very sturdy and will not come apart while carrying. Have bought two and the first one I have had for 10 years and it is very durable because I am rough on things. Worth every cent if you have a small animal. 2 cats fit in easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveled Coast to Coast with my Kitties!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for a 2500 mile cross country move from one coast to the other. My kitties were safe and they fit nicely in the back of our SUV. Very sturdy and easy to move around. At our destination they were a breeze to take apart and hose down for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Dani L.

customer_reviews.title: It serves it's purpose and my dog sleeps fine in it
customer_reviews.text: It seems thin and cheaply made for something so expensive. It serves it's purpose and my dog sleeps fine in it, I just expected something a little heftier for the price. The plastic is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Dana E.

customer_reviews.title: Color is not accurately described
customer_reviews.text: Ordered bleahed linen but received a color best described as the color of a cardboard box. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: My puppy was crate trained when I got her and the breeder was already using a crate like this. She's a small havanese and has enough space to move around but not much that she would soil in the kennel. Very easy to out together and came in a timely manner. I recommend it for anyone with small dogs
customer_reviews.author: Amybcd

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe Night Home for Dolly
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these kennels that I have purchased for Dolly. This one I keep in the bedroom so that she is near us, but safe all night. She loves to go into the kennel at night. The other kennel I have is the exact same one and I have had it for 3 years and experienced no problems with it. I would buy another one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: The Kennel arrived on time and it was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The Kennel arrived on time and it was very easy to assemble. The parts go together easily and the design seems very well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Vari Kennel is the only brand I use for Airline Travel
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a good price. It seems to be a bit "thinner" than the regular "old type" Vari Kennel, but it serves it purpose as one of the best crates to use on airline travel and is made with nuts and bolts, which is now required. I trust it to keep my puppy safe.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Solid kennel.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, works great for my pup. Wish you could get a divider with it. Had to make one myself. Still a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: meshaver10

customer_reviews.title: Best crate ever!
customer_reviews.text: this is my fourth crate....i have purchased....they hold up great easy to clean...easy to assemble and take apart to store. best travel crate ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable and good for small pets
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable and good for small pets. Love the bars on the windows as they prevent chewing. Also a good idea for use to transport pets in vehicles. My pup loves his crate and runs in it every night at bedtime. Definitely would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with home smashed into the back and i totally wrong color. Very disappointed in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Walter

customer_reviews.title: Rattling noise
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent crate but I returned mine on account of the horrible rattling noise from the front gate (metal on metal). Was planning to use them in the bed of my pickup truck but the loose fitting hardware on the front gate produced an unpleasant rattling noise which was not acceptable. Also, this crate's door only opens from right to left. I have another Petmate, an Elite Series 800 from Petco that is of higher quality, has a door that opens to the left or right, and a rubber-coated metal gate that eliminates rattling noises. Overall a good crate for stationary/home use but not ideal for travel because of the rattling noise.
customer_reviews.author: Dogman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Travel.
customer_reviews.text: We had one of the Petmate kennels for about 8 years and needed to replace it only because we backed over it after it was left behind the truck by accident. (No the dog wasn't in it!) They are good quality and hold up to a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: D. Graf

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Shipped our cat on an airplane across the country in this carrier. The amazing thing is that in 12 hours the cat did not mess in the carrier at all. Held up and was approved by the airline.
customer_reviews.author: AirplanePilot

customer_reviews.title: My dog escape thru the small opening and it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog escape thru the small opening and it's not very secure . It also says that is travel ready but it's not it doesn't have ventilation on the back.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: I got the Small size for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Best part is, this one is very simple to put together. No huge bag of cheap plastic connecting parts! Also came with quite a few extra connecting pieces!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great size for adult cats
customer_reviews.text: This gives my cat(s) (I have two kennels) all the room they need to stand up and turn around. It is airline approved and it breaks down into an easily storable size. One of my Vari Kennels has been back and forth across the country several times and is still in great shape!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and airline regulations are met with this kennel for air travel.
customer_reviews.author: Henri Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Used to ship a macaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to ship (airline) my Greenwinged Macaw. I screwed a perch through the side and she fit great. She arrived across the country safely. The crate held up great.
customer_reviews.author: DDR1981

customer_reviews.title: Product fine but filthy
customer_reviews.text: The kennel itself was fine but it was absolutely filthy. All the pieces needed to be cleaned. I didn't expect kennel to be in this condition since it is a new product.
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed Moose is very happy with his new crate
customer_reviews.author: Donna leonard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size Small Shipping Kennel
customer_reviews.text: This kennel is the perfect size. It is the exact max size for the "small" pet crate for pets that are shipped in cargo. After a long search we finally found this perfect size to give the 8 lb puppies the perfect ride home.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It serves as her safe spot, place to sleep and travel in. Very well made
customer_reviews.author: llg

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a small crate for my teacup puppy and she hated it. I got this one with plenty of room and she loves it. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Dee - NEW Mexico

customer_reviews.title: Warning - shipped without a door!
customer_reviews.text: Just a word of caution - I received my vari kennel at what I thought was a good price - didn't fully open it right away. When I did, I discovered that it had been shipped to me without a door. A serious drawback for a dog crate! Unfortunately, it was beyond the return period and now I'm stuck with a crate without a door. I'll have to order my own door.
customer_reviews.author: S Kirk

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible expensive substitute for good money paid on other large kennels. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: SINCITY DOGS

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: These kennels, (2) were perfect for my cats. They traveled in the car for 4K miles and never made a peep! Excellent kennel.
customer_reviews.author: Ondreja V. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: These are great crates for shipping animals on airlines, BUT the descriptions says "rear vents". There are no rear vents. Now, most airlines require rear vents. Why do you have that on your description if it's not true???? Please change it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pnut

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I wish the release handle was a little smaller. Otherwise, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: First one damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine crate for my 12# cat and a great price. The first one I ordered came in a flimsy box, with no padding and was cracked. Unfortunately, I saw the crack after assembly. No problem with the return but Amazon did a very poor packing job. The only negative is the nuts needed to secure the screws. About half were defective and could not be tightened down to where needed to do the job. With both crates there were many more sets of nuts and screws than needed. I think they supply the same number regardless of the size of the crate ordered. Only because of all the extras did I have enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great service, fast shipping. Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect carrier for flying my bird to Hawai'i! He had a 7 day quarantine and he was fine in this carrier... it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kerlin

customer_reviews.title: The ease of returning this was great. I will repurchase it in a larger size
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because I purchased the incorrect size. The ease of returning this was great. I will repurchase it in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Comp

customer_reviews.title: crate just the right size for Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: love this crate. very well constructed. should last for ever. My chihuahua loves it. I like the color, it's nice to have the light interior color.
customer_reviews.author: ute thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Airline approved
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Airline approved. When looking for a kennel prior to putting my 2 dogs on a plane I had a difficult time finding a kennel that met the regulations and size required. I found these online and was unsure if they would work until they arrived. They were easy to assemble and pleanty spacious. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roberts

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a small dog. Wouldn't think of anything else to use for my dog. A must have crate.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great but they weigh more than specified
customer_reviews.text: The description states that they weigh like 1.3 pounds or whatever and when I was weighing the with just some 16oz water bottles and pads, no animals... They were like 7.7lbs! Took out water and bowls and pad and tried again and it was still over 6! But they are well made, easy to put together, sturdy, etc. They really are great little cat kennels, way better than most I've found and you need something sturdy for cargo air travel so these work.
customer_reviews.author: JackedHoof

customer_reviews.title: Vari Kennels are the Best!
customer_reviews.text: The very kennel is nice. I ordered 4 of them but one came broken. I think Vari kennels are best.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise relatively sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is much thinner than I hoped for, but otherwise relatively sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Good little carrier
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together...it's also quite sturdy. It's ideal for a cat or small dog. I am sure that it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Cats from brazil
customer_reviews.text: Had to transport cats from brazil and this case gave us no problems with the American Airlines and the US government. This casewas great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Valle

customer_reviews.title: Petmate Ultra Vari Kennel
customer_reviews.text: Great portable carrier for travel, this crate can also double for an indoor crate. It is sturdy and can be easily cleaned and disassembled for storage. An excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne B Baldyga

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - except NO rear vents!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two small size crates. Petmate makes a good crate! But, international air flights in particular REQUIRE venting on all four sides of the crate. The small crates are not vented in the rear. We solved this issue by drilling a bunch of 1" holes. This is not an impossible fix, and the crate is very sturdy, but you have to have a powerful drill as the plastic is tough. I would have given the product 5 stars had the description been correct. With a correct description, I probably would have bought the crate anyway and drilled it, as I know the brand is good, but I was very annoyed to be fibbed to.
customer_reviews.author: Always Learning

customer_reviews.title: petmate ultra vari kennel
customer_reviews.text: the petmate kennel was a great buy...was comfortable for the cats...they travelled from Miami USA to Sydney australia...would recomend this product for anyone who is taking pets overseas or even interstate
customer_reviews.author: peter whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great fory cats long flights from Oregon to Virginia! Was big enough but not too big. I am extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Got the product in an appropriate amount of time and I am very satisfied with what I ordered. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Garfinkle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good crate, but handle very flimsy and has come off
customer_reviews.author: Janine Glass

customer_reviews.title: Got my precious dogs home  safely and smoothly!
customer_reviews.text: I received this vari kennel in about a week. It is the premier airline choice so I had no problem shipping my two toy Chihuahuas in it. It is made of durable material and the beige color is nice and neutral. The price was very competitive since the pet stores sell low quality brands for the same price or more.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Duros

customer_reviews.title: Cat Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This Cat carrier is a good one for airline use. Does not havee vents in the back as shown, though. worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet Crate
customer_reviews.text: High Quality, I have one that is about 20 years old and is still in great shape! I just bought a Third one A+++
customer_reviews.author: Michael Banks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. My dog travels in this crate while in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: not as described
customer_reviews.text: This kennel does not have rear vents as described, and is not "linen" white as shown. It is more beige color... the older version. I notified Amazon of the lack of rear vents (required on airlines) but they have not updated the product description.
customer_reviews.author: cbreview

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the most solid and beautiful kennels I have ever buyed in my life, good for all kind of dogs
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Longobardi

customer_reviews.title: Small Kennel has no holes on rear, unit is NOT IATA compliant.
customer_reviews.text: Should have air vents on all sides, there were none on the rear. I have the medium size cage that DOES have holes in the rear, customers should note that the small kennel does NOT have holes in the rear, and that makes it NOT IATA compliant. Due to the lack of time I have I have had to drill holes on the rear face to be able to transport my cat internationally.
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crack
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after 2 days use... Yes something fell on it, but not a heavy item...lucky my puppy wasn't in it at the time. Can't imagine trusting to use this for airplane travel.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Client

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Just had to change out plastic screws ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just had to change out plastic screws with metal ones to meet airline requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: cheap made with no rear vents
customer_reviews.text: Didnt have rear vents plus really cheap plastic in my opinion.... HAD to use it because had no choice.... really think I should be refunded at least 50% ··
customer_reviews.author: Teri Spielman

product_meta.title: Petmate Ultra Vari Kennel
product_meta.description: Color:BLEACHED LINEN| Size:UP TO 15LBSPetmate Ultra Vari Kennel is a secure and comfortable travel kennel that keeps your pet safe. The 360-degree ventilation openings give pets fresh air and increased visibility. The wire vents, raised interior, and tie-down holes can withstand the rigors of travel while keeping pets comfortable. The kennel offers heavy-duty protection with its durable plastic shell, metal screws, and covered door posts. The secure latch provides a strong lock for the door while also being easy to open with one hand. The kennel can quickly be assembled with no tools required via metal screws. The environment friendly plastic material is easy to clean and wipe down. The kennel is available in different sizes, ranging from 25-90 pounds, to accommodate a wide range of pets. The travel kennel meets most airline cargo specifications for easy and safe travel, but pet owners should always check with individual airlines.
feature_bullets: DOG AIR TRAVEL KENNEL: This small dog travel kennel features tie-down strap holes, wire vents for ventilation & a raised interior to keep pets safe and comfortable. For small dogs up to 10 lbs. Measures: 19"
AIRLINE-ADAPTABLE: This dog crate meets most airline cargo specifications. Made with heavy duty recycled plastic material and features an easy-open front latch to quickly access pets.
KENNELS & HOUSES: Crate & kennel training is vital for dog safety & comfort. We provide traditional travel carriers, wire training & exercise kennels, play pens, barn-style dog houses & more

Petmate: For over 50 years, we at Petmate are passionate about our dogs, cats & furry friends in general. Starting with the very first dog kennel, we've produced plenty of eco-friendly products that pets will love.

JUST FOR PETS: Petmate makes a variety of pet products for dogs, cats, chickens & other small furry friends! Check out our brands such as Aspen Pet, Arm & Hammer, Booda, Chuckit!, Jackson Galaxy & more!
